tool_description: News API for climate change issues worldwide.
name: Climate Change Live Feed
title: Climate Change Live Feed

api_list.name: Aquire Individual New and Information Source
api_list.description: Get news and/or information from a single resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-feed.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-feed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-feed.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-feed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
